title: PM E-Drive scheme to have phased manufacturing plan to push EV parts production
description: The Prime Minister's E-DRIVE scheme will support local manufacturing of electric vehicle components through a phased manufacturing programme. Companies sourcing components locally will receive financial support without a domestic value addition mandate. The scheme replaces the FAME initiative and includes biannual inspections to prevent subsidy misuse.
